name: My Pool, My Rules
description:
"My Pool, My Rules" is a game inspired on the way i play Pool on the farmhouse that i was in, you objective is to throw random balls into the hole.          
Methods how to play: You can be the calm player, someone that don't use chaos to throw the balls but yes move slowly, or maybe the chaotic player, make trickshots, have the risk to throw the balls out of the table and lose a lot of lives, what method would you choose? My YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC926wiai77-ThcvJKkh0PuA/videos
